00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_SERVERLAUNCHER_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_SERVERLAUNCHER_H
00024 
00025 #include <iostream>
00026 
00027 extern "C" {
00028 #include <signal.h>
00029 #include <sys/types.h>
00030 #include <unistd.h>
00031 #include <poll.h>
00032 }
00033 
00034 namespace Hypertable {
00035 
00036   class ServerLauncher {
00037   public:
00038     ServerLauncher(const char *path, char *const argv[], const char *outfile=0) {
00039       int fd[2];
00040       m_path = path;
00041       if (pipe(fd) < 0) {
00042         perror("pipe");
00043         exit(1);
00044       }
00045       if ((m_child_pid = fork()) == 0) {
00046         if (outfile) {
00047           int outfd = open(outfile, O_CREAT|O_TRUNC|O_WRONLY, 0644);
00048           if (outfd < 0) {
00049             perror("open");
00050             exit(1);
00051           }
00052           dup2(outfd, 1);
00053         }
00054         close(fd[1]);
00055         dup2(fd[0], 0);
00056         close(fd[0]);
00057         execv(path, argv);
00058       }
00059       close(fd[0]);
00060       m_write_fd = fd[1];
00061       poll(0,0,2000);
00062     }
00063 
00064     ~ServerLauncher() {
00065       std::cerr << "Killing '" << m_path << "' pid=" << m_child_pid << std::endl << std::flush;
00066       if (kill(m_child_pid, 9) == -1)
00067         perror("kill");
00068     }
00069 
00070     int get_write_descriptor() { return m_write_fd; }
00071 
00072     pid_t get_pid() { return m_child_pid; }
00073 
00074   private:
00075     const char *m_path;
00076     pid_t m_child_pid;
00077     int   m_write_fd;
00078   };
00079 
00080 }
00081 
00082 #endif // HYPERTABLE_SERVERLAUNCHER_H
